## TreeItem interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface TreeItem 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [children?](./components.treeitem.children.md) |  | [TreeItem](./components.treeitem.md)<!-- -->\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> Child TreeItems to recursively render. |
|  [depth?](./components.treeitem.depth.md) |  | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Depth of the item, which affects its left position for hierarchical rendering. |
|  [expanded?](./components.treeitem.expanded.md) |  | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Indicates the item is expanded and should display child items and content. |
|  [group?](./components.treeitem.group.md) |  | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Key of the group this item belongs to, if groups are specified. |
|  [iconName?](./components.treeitem.iconname.md) |  | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional icon to show before the text. |
|  [key](./components.treeitem.key.md) |  | string |  |
|  [menuItems?](./components.treeitem.menuitems.md) |  | IContextualMenuItem\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> List of menu items to display in a right-side dropdown menu. |
|  [onClick?](./components.treeitem.onclick.md) |  | (item: [TreeItem](./components.treeitem.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; void | <i>(Optional)</i> Individual click handler for this item. Will suppress top-level onItemClick if set. |
|  [onExpand?](./components.treeitem.onexpand.md) |  | (item: [TreeItem](./components.treeitem.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; void | <i>(Optional)</i> Individual click handler for this item's expand/collapse icon. Will suppress top-level onItemExpandClick if set. |
|  [onRenderContent?](./components.treeitem.onrendercontent.md) |  | IRenderFunction&lt;[TreeItemProps](./components.treeitemprops.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Render function for the child content of the item, including child nodes. |
|  [onRenderTitle?](./components.treeitem.onrendertitle.md) |  | IRenderFunction&lt;[TreeItemProps](./components.treeitemprops.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Render function for the title content of the item. Includes the content \*between\* the expand/collapse button and the menu items. |
|  [selected?](./components.treeitem.selected.md) |  | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Indicates the item is selected and should be styled as such. |
|  [text?](./components.treeitem.text.md) |  | string | <i>(Optional)</i> |
